extendedInfo.description: Need to lose a few pounds? Did you make a resolution to get Healthier in 2012?Let The Apple Cider Vinegar Diet App assist you in achieving your goals!The Benefits of apple cider vinegar were first noted by the ancient Egyptians who used it for weight loss and as an anti-septic.Modern research has found even more benefits of apple cider vinegar such as:â  Natural Detoxifierâ  Assists in stabilizing blood glucose levelsâ  Reduce infectionâ  Makes you feel fullerâ  May help treat high cholesterol and high blood pressureâ  Helps in stopping overeatingâ  Helps indigestionThe most challenging health condition facing the world today is obesity. Obesity has been linked to some very serious medical conditions such as Coronary Heart Disease, Type 2 Diabetes and many forms of Cancer. Obesity reduces productivity and dramatically increases health care costs.Apple Cider Vinegar can help you on your weight loss journey. It is an all-natural weight loss reduction drink that you can prepare at home. Apple cider vinegar is full of Potassium and Calcium and itâs an antioxidant which means that it can help your body to fight toxin damage.Regular consumption of apple cider vinegar can reduce the pain of arthritis and also assist the liver in detoxifying the body. It also aids in the treatment of Candida by rebalancing the pH level of the body.You know that reducing your weight will help you feel better and look better, now you need to take the next step and take action!Let The Apple Cider Vinegar Diet App assist you in the next step by downloading it right Now.Itâs FREE and packed with Great Information to help you become The New You ïDownload right now to get started Today!***** Legal Disclaimer *******The Apple Cider Vinegar Diet App makes no claims to the amount of weight that you will lose or if you will lose any weight at all. This app is for informational purposes only and there is no implied warranty or guarantee that this will work for you. As always Please contact your medical professional before beginning this or any other weight loss plan.
